tool_description: Find good places to eat Pizza.
name: New Pizza-API
title: New Pizza-API

api_list.name: Get some of the Pizza´s local points in London
api_list.description: This Endpoint will return in Json all the mentioned Pizzas names in London area.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-pizza-api.p.rapidapi.com/Pizzas"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-pizza-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://new-pizza-api.p.rapidapi.com/Pizzas"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-pizza-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
